author: ianna
body:
#### PR description:

* Tracker algorithms are moved to ```Geometry/TrackerCommonData/plugins/dd4hep```
* DD4hep plugins are moved to ```DetectorDescription/DDCMS/plugins/dd4hep```
* Tests are moved to ```DetectorDescription/DDCMS/plugins/test```
* BuildFile cleaned up

title: DD4hep: Move Files to an Approved Directory Structure
